text:
Cloud Parity - San Jose, CA | Front-end developers

Cloud Parity is looking for front-end developers to work on our Cordova/PhoneGap application. Candidates would ideally have extensive experience with Javascript, Backbone (or other similar frameworks), HTML5/CSS, and perhaps some good understanding of development in Android and iOS.

We are building an innovative social network and are nearing launch.

Visit www.cloudparity.com/jobs for more information!
